SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatx1005.service

Class DatabaseService

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatx1005.service.DatabaseService
public class DatabaseService extends Object

Service class for database operations.

This class provides methods for accessing and manipulating data in the database. It follows the Singleton pattern to ensure only one instance of the class exists.

Since:
V0.1.0
Author:
William Holtsdalen, Hector Mendana Morales

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DatabaseService getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of the DatabaseService.
      Returns:
      The DatabaseService instance

    • getUnassignedTasksBySizeAndPriority

      public List<Task> getUnassignedTasksBySizeAndPriority()
      Retrieves all unassigned tasks, sorted by priority and size.
      Returns:
      a list of unassigned tasks

    • getTasksCompletedToday

      public List<Task> getTasksCompletedToday()
      Retrieves all tasks that were completed today.
      Returns:
      a list of tasks that were completed today

    • getTasksCompletedThisWeek

      public List<Task> getTasksCompletedThisWeek()
      Retrieves all tasks that were completed this week.
      Returns:
      a list of tasks that were completed this week.

    • getTasksAssignedToUser

      public List<Task> getTasksAssignedToUser(User user)
      Retrieves the list of tasks that are assigned to the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to find assigned tasks for.
      Returns:
      a list of tasks that are assigned to the user.

    • addTask

      public void addTask(String title, String description, LocalDateTime dueDate, Priority priority, Size size, List<UUID> assignedUserIds)
      Adds a new task to the database with the given parameters, and updates the cache afterwards.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the task
      description - the description of the task
      dueDate - the due date of the task
      priority - the priority of the task
      size - the size of the task
      assignedUserIds - the list of user IDs assigned to the task

    • logTaskChange

      public void logTaskChange(UUID taskId, String description, UUID changedBy)
      Logs a change to a task in the changelog.
      Parameters:
      taskId - the ID of the task that was changed
      description - the description of the change
      changedBy - the ID of the user who made the change

    • getTaskChanges

      public List<TaskChange> getTaskChanges(UUID taskId)
      Retrieves all changes made to a specific task.
      Parameters:
      taskId - the ID of the task to get changes for
      Returns:
      a list of changes made to the task

    • updateTask

      public void updateTask(Task task, UUID changedBy)
      Updates the task in the database with the given task's id, with the properties of the given task, and updates the cache afterwards. Also logs the change in the changelog.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to update
      changedBy - the ID of the user who made the change

    • deleteTask

      public void deleteTask(Task task)
      Deletes the given task from the database.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to delete

    • getAllUsersByCapacity

      public List<User> getAllUsersByCapacity()
      Retrieves all users in the database and returns them as a list, sorted by their available capacity in descending order.
      Returns:
      a list of all users in the database, sorted by their available capacity

    • getTaskAssignees

      public List<User> getTaskAssignees(Task task)
      Retrieves the list of users that are assigned to the given task.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to find assigned users for.
      Returns:
      a list of users that are assigned to the task.

    • getUserAvailableCapacity

      public int getUserAvailableCapacity(User user)
      Retrieves the workload as an integer for the given user. The workload is calculated by summarizing the sizes of all tasks assigned to the user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to retrieve the workload for.
      Returns:
      the integer representing the user's workload.

    • getUserWorkload

      public int getUserWorkload(User user)
      Retrieves the workload for the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to retrieve the workload for.
      Returns:
      the integer representing the user's workload.

    • addUser

      public boolean addUser(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String passwordText)
      Adds a new user to the database with the given credentials, and updates the cache afterwards.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the user's first name
      lastName - the user's last name
      email - the user's email
      passwordText - the user's password in plain text for salting and hashing
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully added, false otherwise

    • assignTaskToUser

      public void assignTaskToUser(Task task, User user, UUID changedBy)
      Assigns the given task to the given user and updates the database accordingly.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to assign
      user - the user to assign the task to
      changedBy - the ID of the user who made the change

    • completeTask

      public void completeTask(Task task, UUID changedBy)
      Completes the given task and updates it in the database.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to complete
      changedBy - the ID of the user who made the change

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User user)
      Updates the user in the database with the given user's id, with the properties of the given user, and updates the cache afterwards.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to update

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser(User user)
      Removes the given user from the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to remove

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword(User user, String password)
      Validates if the provided password matches the user's current password.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to validate password for
      password - the password to validate
      Returns:
      true if password matches, false otherwise

    • updateUserPassword

      public void updateUserPassword(User user, String newPassword) throws UserDoesNotExistException
      Updates the user's password in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to update password for
      newPassword - the new password
      Throws:
      UserDoesNotExistException - if user does not exist

    • userExists

      private boolean userExists(UUID userId)
      Checks if a user with the given ID exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to check
      Returns:
      true if user exists, false otherwise

    • authenticateUser

      public User authenticateUser(String email, String password)
      Authenticates a user with the given email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user to authenticate
      password - the password of the user to authenticate
      Returns:
      the authenticated user, or null if the user could not be authenticated.
